meta.title: Data Bureau — Scientific visualization for publication
meta.description: Turn your figures into accepted publications: figure revision for Nature, Science, Lancet and others.
hero.title: Turn your data into accepted publications
hero.lead: We enhance your figures for maximum clarity, impact and compliance with high-impact journal guidelines (Nature, Science, Lancet).
slider.caption: Clear visual hierarchy and appropriate colors improve comprehension and acceptance in scientific publications
problem.title: The problem
problem.p1: Researchers face rejections and lengthy reviews because of figures with poor hierarchy, inappropriate colors and low print quality.
benefit.1: Reduce reviews due to graphic issues
benefit.2: Improve visual impact and storytelling of your results
benefit.3: Deliver submission-ready files (300–450 dpi, editable formats)
how.title: How it works
how.step1: Submit your figures — PNG, SVG, PDF and raw data.
how.step2: We review and redesign — typography, accessible colors, hierarchy.
how.step3: We deliver packages — PNG/SVG/PDF + editable source file ready for submission.
testi.1: “Figures were ready for Nature — accepted on first submission.” — Dr. A. Silva, Epidemiology
testi.2: “Clarity and consistency made all the difference in review.” — Prof. L. Nguyen, Bioinformatics
testi.3: “Fast and meticulous team — recommended.” — Dr. M. Patel, Genetics
contact.title: Request quote
contact.p1: Fill out the form below with information about your project. We offer single-author, group and full manuscript review packages.
about.title: Who we are
about.p1: We are a multidisciplinary team of scientists, designers and communication specialists focusing on figures for manuscripts and scientific presentations.
about.method.title: Our methodology
about.method.1: Technical review of the figure content (what must the reader see?)
about.method.2: Graphic redesign with visual hierarchy and appropriate typography
about.method.3: Validation against the chosen journal's guidelines
about.method.4: Delivery of editable files and high-resolution exports
about.creds.title: Credentials
about.creds.1: Experience with submissions to high-impact journals
about.creds.2: Work with accessible palettes and colorblind testing
about.creds.3: Flexible deadlines and delivery for meetings and revisions
case.crispr.title: CRISPR/Cas9 — Gene editing mechanism
case.crispr.desc: Refined mechanistic diagrams from the original CRISPR-Cas9 paper (Jinek et al., 2012). Accessible colors, clear hierarchy and precise annotations.
case.transformers.title: Transformers — Attention Architecture
case.transformers.desc: Technical diagrams from 'Attention is All You Need' paper (Vaswani et al., 2017). Encoder-decoder architecture with multi-head attention.
case.bitcoin.title: Bitcoin — Peer-to-peer system
case.bitcoin.desc: Flowcharts and diagrams from Bitcoin whitepaper (Nakamoto, 2008). Clear visualization of blockchain, proof-of-work and transactions.
